name: riseroll
description: A Progressive Web App for randomly picking daily morning activities with re-roll limits and activity management
author: Working Computers

scripts.release: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.package: VERSION=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && cd dist && tar -czf ../riseroll-v$VERSION.tar.gz . && cd .. && echo "Release package created: riseroll-v$VERSION.tar.gz"
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && cd dist && python -m http.server 8000
scripts.deploy:serve: npm run build && npx serve -s dist -l 3000
